trans-unit.source: An abstract class that when implemented provides an identity that enables the authentication of an endpoint by clients that exchange messages with it.
trans-unit.target: 實作時會提供身分識別的抽象類別，這個身分識別可讓與端點交換訊息的用戶端驗證端點。

trans-unit.source: The value of the identity for an endpoint can be set with constructors of <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>, where its value can also be accessed as a read-only <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Identity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 端點的身分識別值可以用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress><xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Identity%2A>的建構函式設定，此時其值也可以當做唯讀的 屬性存取。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立空的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name for the DNS identity.
trans-unit.target: DNS 身分識別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a DNS identity with a specified DNS name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 DNS 名稱建立 DNS 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: A DNS <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> associated with the specified <paramref name="dnsName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /><paramref name="dnsName" />關聯的 DNS 。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain a DNS claim that represents this identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含代表這個身分識別的 DNS 宣告。

trans-unit.source: This static method creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity> by calling its constructor <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態方法會呼叫其建構函式 <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity>，藉此建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dnsName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dnsName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> used to create the new identity.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立新身分識別的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an identity with the specified claim.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的宣告建立身分識別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> associated with the specified <paramref name="identity" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> 相關聯的 <paramref name="identity" />。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain the identity claim used to construct this identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含用來建構這個身分識別的身分識別宣告。

trans-unit.source: This method can create an identity of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.UpnEndpointIdentity>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.UpnEndpointIdentity> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity>類型的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="identity" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an RSA identity.
trans-unit.target: 建立 RSA 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain a claim that contains the RSA public key used to construct this identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含具有用來建構這個身分識別之 RSA 公開金鑰的宣告。

trans-unit.source: One of these static methods creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity> by calling its constructor <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些靜態方法的其中一個方法會呼叫其建構函式 <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity>，藉此建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the certificate for the RSA identity.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />，其中包含 RSA 身分識別的憑證。

trans-unit.source: Creates an RSA identity with the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 憑證建立 RSA 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: An RSA <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> associated with the specified <paramref name="certificate" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> 關聯的 RSA <paramref name="certificate" />。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain a claim that contains the RSA public key obtained from the certificate used to construct this identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含以下這類宣告：內含的 RSA 公開金鑰是從用來建構這個身分識別的憑證取得。

trans-unit.source: This static method creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity> by calling its constructor, <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態方法會呼叫其建構函式 <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity>，藉此建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is not an RSA certificate.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 不是 RSA 憑證。

trans-unit.source: The public key for the RSA identity.
trans-unit.target: RSA 身分識別的公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Creates an RSA identity with the specified public key.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的公開金鑰建立 RSA 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: An RSA <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> associated with the specified <paramref name="publicKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> 關聯的 RSA <paramref name="publicKey" />。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain a claim that contains the RSA public key used to construct this identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含具有用來建構這個身分識別之 RSA 公開金鑰的宣告。

trans-unit.source: This static method creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity> by calling its constructor, <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態方法會呼叫其建構函式 <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity>，藉此建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.RsaEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="publicKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="publicKey" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name for the SPN identity.
trans-unit.target: SPN 身分識別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a server principal name (SPN) identity with a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱建立伺服器主要名稱 (SPN) 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: An SPN <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> associated with the specified <paramref name="spnName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> 關聯的 SPN <paramref name="spnName" />。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity uses the SPN when performing SSPI authentication with the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會在對端點進行 SSPI 驗證時使用 SPN。

trans-unit.source: This static method creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity> by calling its constructor, <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>, using `spnName` as the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態方法會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity> 做為輸入參數來呼叫其建構函式 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>，藉此建立 `spnName` 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If `spnName` is specified with an empty string, authentication falls back from Kerberos to NTLM if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果是以空字串指定 `spnName`，則驗證程序會盡可能從 Kerberos 退回使用 NTLM。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsClientCredential.AllowNtlm%2A> is `false`, authentication fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsClientCredential.AllowNtlm%2A> 為 `false`，驗證就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="spnName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="spnName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name for the UPN identity.
trans-unit.target: UPN 身分識別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a user principal name (UPN) identity with a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱建立使用者主要名稱 (UPN) 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: A UPN <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> associated with the specified <paramref name="upnName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> 關聯的 UPN <paramref name="upnName" />。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity uses the UPN when performing SSPI authentication with the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會在對端點進行 SSPI 驗證時使用 UPN。

trans-unit.source: This static method creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.UpnEndpointIdentity> by calling its constructor, <xref:System.ServiceModel.UpnEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>, using `upnName` as the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態方法會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.UpnEndpointIdentity> 做為輸入參數來呼叫其建構函式 <xref:System.ServiceModel.UpnEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>，藉此建立 `upnName` 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If `upnName` is specified with an empty string, authentication falls back from Kerberos to NTLM if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果是以空字串指定 `upnName`，則驗證程序會盡可能從 Kerberos 退回使用 NTLM。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsClientCredential.AllowNtlm%2A> is `false`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] makes a best-effort to throw an exception if NTLM is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsClientCredential.AllowNtlm%2A> 屬性為 `false`，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會在使用 NTLM 時盡力擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property to `false` may not prevent NTLM credentials from being sent over the wire.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，將此屬性設為 `false`，不一定能夠禁止 NTLM 認證透過網路傳送。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="upnName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="upnName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an X509Certificate identity.
trans-unit.target: 建立 X509Certificate 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: Choose between these two constructors based on whether you have supporting certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您可根據是否有支援的憑證，選擇使用兩個建構函式的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain the claim that contains the thumbprint of the certificate used to construct this identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含內有用來建構這個身分識別之憑證指紋的宣告。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the certificate for the identity.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />，其中包含身分識別的憑證。

trans-unit.source: Creates an X509Certificate identity with the specified certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的憑證建立 X509Certificate 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: An X509Certificate <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> associated with the specified <paramref name="certificate" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> 關聯的 X509Certificate <paramref name="certificate" />。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain the claim that contains the thumbprint of the certificate used to construct this identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含內有用來建構這個身分識別之憑證指紋的宣告。

trans-unit.source: This `static` method creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.X509CertificateEndpointIdentity> by calling its constructor, <xref:System.ServiceModel.X509CertificateEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>, using `certificate` as the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個 `static` 方法會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.X509CertificateEndpointIdentity> 做為輸入參數來呼叫其建構函式 <xref:System.ServiceModel.X509CertificateEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>，藉此建立 `certificate` 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the primary certificate for the identity.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />，其中包含身分識別的主要憑證。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> that contains the supporting certificates for the identity.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />，其中包含身分識別的支援憑證。

trans-unit.source: Creates an X509Certificate identity with the specified primary and supporting certificates.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的主要與支援憑證建立 X509Certificate 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain the claim that contains the thumbprint of the certificate used to construct this identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含內有用來建構這個身分識別之憑證指紋的宣告。

trans-unit.source: An X509Certificate <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> associated with the specified <paramref name="primaryCertificate" /> and <paramref name="supportingCertificates." />
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <paramref name="primaryCertificate" /> 和 <paramref name="supportingCertificates." /> 建立關聯的 X509Certificate <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" />

trans-unit.source: This static method creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.X509CertificateEndpointIdentity> by calling its constructor, <xref:System.ServiceModel.X509CertificateEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A>, using `primaryCertificate` and `supportingCertificates` as input parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態方法會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.X509CertificateEndpointIdentity> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.X509CertificateEndpointIdentity.%23ctor%2A> 當做輸入參數來呼叫其建構函式 `primaryCertificate`，藉此建立 `supportingCertificates` 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="primaryCertificate" /> or <paramref name="supportingCertificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="primaryCertificate" /> 或 <paramref name="supportingCertificates" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that determines whether a specified object is equal to the current identity object or if they have equal security properties.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會判斷指定的物件是否與目前的身分識別物件相等，或是否擁有相同的安全性屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object <paramref name="obj" /> is equivalent to the current identity or contains the same security properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件 <see langword="true" /> 與目前的身分識別相等或包含相同安全性屬性，則為 <paramref name="obj" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides a hash code for the current instance of the identity.
trans-unit.target: 針對身分識別目前的執行個體提供雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current identity.
trans-unit.target: 目前身分識別的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity claim that corresponds to the identity.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應到身分識別的身分識別宣告。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> that represents the identity claim.
trans-unit.target: 表示身分識別宣告的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" />。

trans-unit.source: Clients that authenticate the server should verify that the claims that represent the server contain the identity claim provided by the `EndpointIdentity`.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器的用戶端應確認代表伺服器的宣告包含 `EndpointIdentity`提供的身分識別宣告。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> with the specified claim.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的宣告初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the constructors of all the classes derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity.Initialize%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由所有衍生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity.Initialize%2A>) 之類別的建構函式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> with the specified claim and an interface and compares equality.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的宣告及介面來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity" /> 並比較是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the identity.
trans-unit.target: 傳回身分識別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> of the form "identity(string)" where string = <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity.IdentityClaim" />.
trans-unit.target: "identity(string)" 形式的 <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中 string = <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity.IdentityClaim" />。
